lore: These creatures have recently been put up for sale on the Siralim black market. They are fast, tough and capable of knocking down a wall without too much difficulty. The authorities believe they were made by a Mage who managed to escape from prison not long ago, but the investigation has not yet concluded. If wound up, this creature emits a hallucinogenic gas through its ears that takes five minutes to take effect, making it a potential tool for thieves.
menagerieDialog: I do not wish to speak to you right now. I would prefer to return to where I came from.
You would dare to rip me from my portal and summon me to this dying world? You have no shame.
I am bound to serve you, but know that it is not by choice.
I do not belong here in your filthy Menagerie. I deserve my own quarters in your castle!
Give me freedom, or give me death!
name: Toyland Amalgamation
